Description:
Lead, plan, and execute audit engagements in accordance with professional auditing standards and firm guidelines.
Supervise and mentor a team of audit professionals, providing guidance and support to enhance their skills and performance.
Develop audit strategies, risk assessments, and audit plans tailored to client needs.
Review and analyze financial statements, internal controls, and audit findings to identify areas for improvement and recommend solutions.
Maintain effective communication with clients, addressing their concerns, and presenting audit findings in a clear and professional manner.
Ensure timely completion of audit projects, adhering to deadlines and managing resources efficiently.
Stay updated with industry trends, regulatory changes, and best practices in auditing.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in accounting.
A minimum of 7 years of relevant experience in auditing, with a significant portion of that experience obtained in Kuwaiti auditing firms.
Strong understanding of Kuwaiti regulatory requirements and auditing standards.
Proven track record of managing and leading audit engagements.
Excellent knowledge of financial reporting and analysis.
Proficient in using auditing software and Microsoft Office applications.
Exceptional interpersonal, leadership, and communication skills.
Detail-oriented, analytical mindset, and problem-solving abilities.
Ability to manage multiple priorities and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
Fluency in English and Arabic.
PREVIOUS EXPERIENCE IN A KUWAITI AUDITING FIRM.
